name: Paradigm Shift (itch) (Unax)
description:
Through the eye of the devil, I caught a glimpse of the truth.
On the year 10,121 an alien force makes human society collapse. Only the strongest of the strongest can end the drought of hope.

Paradigm Shift is a short JRPG game made in 48 hours. Experience Planet Earth in the year 10,121 (REAL). Defeat the Demon King to save human society.

Can't really say much without spoiling.

                                     

Enjoy.
